DOC.brief_summary: A randomized, cross-over, single-blind study to compare the effects of nebivolol and metoprolol on central aortic pressure and peripheral brachial pressure in patients with stable cardiovascular disease.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Nebivolol on Central Aortic Pressure
DOC.criteria: Subjects with history of hypertension Subjects who have received metoprolol for a minimum of 3 months Patients who have had an acute myocardial infarction, coronary revascularization or who have been hospitalized for heart failure or cardiac arrhythmia in the past 6 months
